name: Firefox for Windows 10
description: A "Metro-like" style with square tabs, light colors, and theme compatibility.
additional_info:
Intended to look fitting with Windows 10 (and perhaps 8\8.1) while not taking it to the point of "everything is white or dead gray".

Themes are supported (and will look correctly at all times).

Should you wish to further finetune this style, a decent amount of comments is included too.

Largely based on
https://userstyles.org/styles/95258/firefox-metro-for-australis
"Close tab" icon is taken from
https://userstyles.org/styles/117714/windows-10-style-for-firefox
